alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chickasaw and western Monroe Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amory, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Prairie, New Wren, Hatley, East Aberdeen, Becker, Bigbee, Muldon, Egypt, Wren and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
